trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Little River
There were no other sightings in Little River on or around July 6th 1967
divs: Sighting DetailsWHILE SITTING ON OUR PATIO IN EVENING, FACING NORTH (lAKE ERIE) AN ORANGE GLOBE CAME UP FROM THE LAKE HEADING SOUTH RIGHT OVER MY HOME. NO SOUND. I KNEW AT ONCE WHAT IT WAS. LATER READ THAT IT LANDED ON OUR PENINSULA. WHAT A THRILL.
